title: Spacious 2 bedroom with Den! Rentals in Brockton. 2 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: Spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment with den for rent on the 2nd floor, lots of natural light, located on a quiet street!
This freshly painted, luminous apartment home features a great size living room, 2 spacious bedrooms with walk-in closets, a large bathroom, and an eat-in kitchen.
Move-in costs are first and last month's rent, and broker fees.
Tenants pay for electricity, gas (heat and hot water), and internet.
Minutes to public transportation, shops, restaurants, supermarkets, and parks.
No pets, and no smoking is allowed in the apartment.
Looking for tenants with good credit, verifiable income, background check, and good landlord references.
Text Message 73014242 to (617) 765-1581 For  Details & Photos Of This Property***
Brought to you by Shirley Lubin at eXp Realty in Rhode Island
